message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great value at $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. What do you think?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $16,000 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Let's see if we can reach a deal.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $14,000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $15,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $14,500. Let's see if we can finalize a deal.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $16,000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a one-year warranty and a free maintenance package. What do you think?
